sentences.en: Amino transferases are located in the cytoplasm, chlorplasts and microbodies.
sentences.cn: 氨基转移酶分布在细胞质 、 叶绿体和微体中.

sentences.en: An infection thread is formed by the cytoplasm of the host cell.
sentences.cn: 侵染线是由寄主细胞的细胞质形成的.

sentences.en: Chromatophilic substance is found within the cytoplasm of dendrites.
sentences.cn: 嗜色质见于树突的细胞质中.

sentences.en: Cytoplasm and the extracellular fluid that surrounds cells contain significant amounts of dissolved electrolytes.
sentences.cn: 细胞质和围绕着细胞的细胞外液体含有大量溶解的电解质.

sentences.en: Enucleate cytoplasm can still synthesize protein.
sentences.cn: 去核的细胞质仍然能合成蛋白质.

sentences.en: IVF often fails in older women because there are abnormalities in the outside of their eggs, known as cytoplasm, which surrounds the nucleus.
sentences.cn: 因为在老年妇女的卵子外部，包围着细胞核的细胞质会畸变，所以她们接受试管受精常以失败告终。

sentences.en: Most of the cytoplasm has been squeezed out in order to make the sperm an efficient torpedo-like swimming machine.
sentences.cn: 大多数细胞质被挤出，为了让精子成为一个高效率的鱼类状游泳机器。

sentences.en: Some maize with S cytoplasm can revert to the fertile condition.
sentences.cn: 有些具有S细胞质的玉米植株可以逆转为可育状态.

sentences.en: The cytoplasm between the desmosomal attachments shrinks.
The cytoplasm of TIL was little. The nucleus was round in shape.
sentences.cn: 电镜下,可见肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞核大,胞质少, 核较圆.

sentences.en: The sea water is said to be hypertonic to the cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 海水对细胞质来说是高渗的.

sentences.en: There are numerous amoeboid nuclei suspended in the organelle - rich cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 在富含细胞器的细胞质中,有许多变形核.

sentences.en: They are stockpiled in the cytoplasm.
They found the surface layer of the cell discontinuous and distinguishable from the cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 他们发现细胞的表层跟细胞质是一不连续的和有差别的.

sentences.en: They slit open the organisms and suck out the cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 它们撕开海藻那单细胞的机体，将细胞质吸出来。

sentences.en: This compartment contains citric acid at a concentration up to 24 times higher than the cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 这种间隔中所含柠檬酸浓度比细胞质高24倍.

sentences.en: Vacuoles are fluid - filled " bubbles " in the cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 液泡是细胞质中充满液体的 “ 泡泡. ”

sentences.en: We say that sea water is isotonic to their cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 我们说,海水对它们的细胞质是等渗的.

words.tran_cn: 胞体质的；细胞质的（等于cytoplasm）

trans.tran_en: all the material in the cell of a living thing except the  nucleus (= central part )
